com.cyc.query.client.explanations

Class ProofViewGeneratorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.query.client.explanations.ProofViewGeneratorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.cyc.query.ProofViewGenerator, com.cyc.query.QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<com.cyc.query.ProofView>

    public class ProofViewGeneratorImpl
extends Object
implements com.cyc.query.ProofViewGenerator
    A QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator backed by a ProofView. Generally, a new ProofViewGenerator object is constructed, parameters are set as desired, then generate() is called to flesh it out. Then you can get its root note (via getExplanation()), and display it as an interactive tree structure.
    Author:
    baxter
